name: UpdateFigmaWebhook
description:
Update a Figma webhook by its ID.

Use this tool to update the settings or parameters of an existing webhook in Figma by specifying the webhook ID.

parameters.name: webhook_id_to_update
parameters.description: Provide the ID of the Figma webhook you want to update.

parameters.name: webhook_update_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing the data for the webhook update, including properties like event type, endpoint, passcode, status, and description.

event_type.description: An enum representing the possible events that a webhook can subscribe to

endpoint.description: The HTTP endpoint that will receive a POST request when the event triggers. Max length 2048 characters.

passcode.description: String that will be passed back to your webhook endpoint to verify that it is being called by Figma. Max length 100 characters.

status.description:
An enum representing the possible statuses you can set a webhook to:
- `ACTIVE`: The webhook is healthy and receive all events
- `PAUSED`: The webhook is paused and will not receive any events

description.description: User provided description or name for the webhook. Max length 150 characters.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the figma API.

An enum representing the possible statuses you can set a webhook to:

- `PAUSED`: The webhook is paused and will not receive any events

description.description: User provided description or name for the webhook. Max length 150 characters.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
